item.title: 重油短缺正成为欧佩克的福音
item.description:
取代俄罗斯供应的争夺战正在引发中东原油溢价大涨。【原文：

The scrum to replace Russian supply is sparking bumper premiums for Middle Eastern crude.

】

item.title: 2024 年爱尔兰医疗和制药产品出口创历史新高
item.description: 新数据显示，爱尔兰出口在2024年创下历史新高，这主要得益于医疗和医药产品出口的增长。【原文：Irish exports hit a record level in 2024, according to new data, largely driven by a boost in medical and pharmaceutical products being sent abroad.】

item.title: 纳格尔称美国新关税将对德国造成特别严重的打击
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，美国的保护主义和贸易关税对德国的打击尤为严重，这使得欧洲最大经济体本已黯淡的前景更加雪上加霜。【原文：Germany would be particularly hard hit by US protectionism and trade tariffs, Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel said, worsening an already gloomy outlook for Europe’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 特朗普带领美国走上互惠贸易的迷茫之路
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普上周下令内阁着手制定 "对等 "关税，提出了一个听起来很简单的概念：美国对进口商品征收的税应该反映其他经济体对美国商品征收的关税。【原文：With his move to order his cabinet to start work on “reciprocal” tariffs, Donald Trump last week laid out what sounds like a simple concept: US taxes on imports should reflect those other economies charge US goods as they cross their borders.】

item.title: 发布信息：气候变化助长了社交媒体的使用
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，德雷克-贝内特（Drake Bennett）将介绍气候变化对我们行为的一种不同寻常的影响。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Drake Bennett writes about an unusual way climate change affects our behavior.】

item.title: 肖尔茨未能振兴德国经济令选民不安
item.description: 我是克雷格-斯特林（Craig Stirling），法兰克福资深编辑。今天我们关注德国经济。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Craig Stirling, a senior editor in Frankfurt. Today we’re looking at the German economy. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称南非需要减少债务以加快增长
item.description: 国际货币基金组织表示，南非必须采取大胆措施，减轻令人窒息的债务负担，促进经济增长。【原文：South Africa must take bold steps to ease a suffocating debt burden and boost economic growth, said the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 巴西、乌克兰，然后是智利？新兴市场交易员押注下一次加息
item.description: 继巴西和乌克兰去年开始加息运动之后，投资者们打赌，下一个效仿的发展中经济体将是智利。【原文：After Brazil and Ukraine embarked on interest-rate hiking campaigns last year, investors are betting that the next developing economy to follow suit will be Chile.】

item.title: 印度计划修改更多关税以遏制特朗普的贸易威胁
item.description: 印度高级官员表示，他们将继续削减进口税，因为政府希望绕过美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对贸易伙伴征收对等关税的计划。【原文：India’s top officials said they will continue to cut import taxes as the government looks to work around US President Donald Trump’s plan to impose reciprocal tariffs on trading partners.】

item.title: 天气转暖，法国电价跌至三个月低点
item.description: 由于西北欧气温将急剧上升，供暖需求减少，法国电力价格跌至三个多月来的最低水平。【原文：French power prices fell to the lowest level in more than three months with temperatures set to rise sharply in northwest Europe, reducing the demand for heating.】

item.title: 为什么中国投资者终于相信习近平的科技打压政策已经结束？
item.description: 早在习近平主席 2 月 17 日会见中国主要企业家之前，投资者就开始大举买入科技股，押注长达数年之久的对民营企业的打压即将结束。【原文：Even before President Xi Jinping met with leading Chinese entrepreneurs on Feb. 17, investors began piling into technology shares, betting that a years-long crackdown on the private sector was at an end.】

item.title: 欧洲再迎大选，股市面临风险
item.description: 周日即将举行的德国联邦大选事关重大，欧洲股票市场的预期结果近乎完美。对一些投资者来说，这增加了令人不快的风险。【原文：Europe’s equity markets are priced for a near-perfect outcome from the high-stakes German federal election coming up on Sunday. For some investors, that raises the risk of a nasty surprise.】

item.title: 改革提振信心，投资者看好尼日利亚资产
item.description: 随着痛苦的改革恢复了人们的信心，尼日利亚终于得到了投资者的青睐，推动股市走高，债券收益率下降。【原文：Nigeria is finally getting a favorable nod from investors, pushing stocks higher and bond yields lower as painful reforms restore confidence.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利淡化经济增长意外，警告经济 "静止不动
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）警告说，英国经济仍处于 "静止状态"，给2024年底出人意料的强劲增长数字泼了一盆冷水。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey warned that the UK economy is still “static,” pouring cold water over surprisingly strong growth figures for the end of 2024.】

item.title: 伊萨雷斯库称罗马尼亚已准备好应对大选后的资本外流风险
item.description: 罗马尼亚央行行长穆古尔-伊萨雷斯库（Mugur Isarescu）表示，如果极右翼候选人在 5 月份的总统选举中获胜，罗马尼亚已准备好应对选举后可能出现的资本外流。【原文：Romania is ready to deal with potential post-election capital outflows should a far-right candidate win the presidential elections in May, according to central bank Governor Mugur Isarescu.】

item.title: 代表称欧佩克+考虑推迟四月重启石油供应
item.description: 与会代表表示，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）呼吁降低价格，欧佩克+仍在考虑推迟定于 4 月份开始的一系列月度供应增加。【原文：OPEC+ is considering pushing back a series of monthly supply increases due to begin in April despite calls from US President Donald Trump to lower prices, delegates said.】

item.title: 巴克莱策略师：英国需要从长期债务中彻底转型
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）策略师莫伊恩-伊斯兰（Moyeen Islam）认为，英国应 "大幅 "削减向投资者出售的长期债券数量，以缓解公共财政压力。【原文：The UK should “radically” cut the amount of long-maturity debt it sells to investors to relieve the pressure on public finances, according to Barclays Plc strategist Moyeen Islam.】

item.title: 印尼迫使出口商将更多收益留在岸上
item.description: 印尼正在推进一项计划，迫使自然资源出口商将更多的外汇收入留在这个东南亚最大经济体的岸上，这项努力旨在增加中央银行 800 亿美元的储备，扭转该国陷入困境的货币下滑趋势。【原文：Indonesia is pushing ahead with a plan to force natural resource exporters to keep more foreign exchange earnings onshore in Southeast Asia’s largest economy, an effort aimed at bolstering central bank reserves by $80 billion and reversing a slide in the country’s beleaguered currency.】

item.title: 蒙古力争将中国煤炭销量提升至 1 亿吨
item.description: 蒙古今年的目标是将对中国的煤炭出口量增加近五分之一，同时寻求与资源匮乏的邻国扩大能源合作。【原文：Mongolia is aiming to increase its coal exports to China by almost a fifth this year, as it seeks to expand energy cooperation with its resource-hungry neighbor.】

item.title: 瑞典失业率创历史新高，支持宽松政策
item.description: 瑞典上个月的失业率意外跃升至历史最高水平，这可能会增加人们对瑞典央行延长宽松政策的预期。【原文：Sweden’s unemployment rate unexpectedly jumped to the highest ever last month, potentially adding expectations for the nation’s central bank to extend its easing campaign.】

item.title: 印度一月份贸易赤字扩大幅度超出预期
item.description: 由于货币迅速贬值，印度的进口支出增加，上个月印度的贸易赤字扩大。【原文：India’s trade gap widened last month as the nation’s import bill rose due to a rapidly falling currency.】

item.title: 衍生品交易是如何吞噬整个市场的？
item.description:
每个人都学会了 "YOLO"。【原文：

Everyone learned to YOLO.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：衍生品如何吞噬整个市场（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：衍生品如何吞噬整个市场（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: How Derivatives Swallowed the Entire Market (Podcast)】

item.title: 库尔德斯坦石油出口可能在一周内恢复：伊拉克部长
item.description: 伊拉克石油部长海扬-阿卜杜勒-加尼（Hayyan Abdul Ghani）表示，伊拉克半自治的库尔德斯坦地区可能在一周内恢复石油出口。【原文：Oil exports from Iraq’s semi-autonomous Kurdistan region could resume within a week, Iraqi Oil Minister Hayyan Abdul Ghani said.】

item.title: 特朗普关税给欧洲乐观的盈利季蒙上阴影
item.description: 与美国贸易紧张局势的威胁给欧洲好于预期的财报季蒙上了阴影。【原文：The threat of trade tensions with the US is overshadowing a better-than-expected earnings season in Europe.】

item.title: 泰国在越来越多的反对声中收紧拟议的赌场规则
item.description: 随着泰国越来越接近成为全球博彩业的最新参与者，人们对问题赌博的可能性日益担忧，因此泰国收紧了将综合 "娱乐综合体 "内的赌场合法化的提案。【原文：Thailand has tightened proposals to legalize casinos within integrated “entertainment complexes,” amid growing concerns about the potential for problem gambling as the nation moves closer to becoming the latest player in the global gaming industry.】

item.title: 中美贸易摊牌之际，一种鲜为人知的金属飙升
item.description: 铋是国防工业中使用的一种鲜为人知但却至关重要的金属，在中国为报复美国关税而将其列入出口管制清单后，铋的价格飙升至十年来的最高点。【原文：Bismuth — a little-known but critical metal used in defense industries — has spiked to a decade-high after China added the commodity to an export-control list in retaliation for US tariffs.】

item.title: 尽管风险隐患重重，TikTok 仍从 Shein 抢占了市场份额
item.description: 就在唐纳德-特朗普总统采取破坏性贸易行动之前，Bytedance 有限公司旗下社交媒体巨头的电子商务功能 TikTok Shop 在美国的销售额超过了竞争对手。【原文：TikTok Shop, the Bytedance Ltd.-owned social media giant’s e-commerce feature, saw its sales outdo competition in the US just before President Donald Trump’s disruptive trade actions.】

item.title: 2024 年最后一个季度瑞士经济增长加快
item.description: 2024 年底，在制造业和服务业发展势头的支撑下，瑞士经济增速超过了经济学家的预测。【原文：Switzerland’s economy picked up pace more than economists forecast at the end of 2024, supported by momentum in both manufacturing and services.】

item.title: 供应担忧缓解，欧洲天然气价格跌幅扩大
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格周一进一步下跌，原因是在 2025 年开局不顺之后，市场情绪有所缓和。【原文：European natural gas prices fell further on Monday as easing sentiment takes hold of the market after a rocky start to 2025.】
